cast.overview: England, 1021. Rob Cole, a boy born in a miserable mining town, swears to become a physician and vanquish disease and death. His harsh path of many years, a quest for knowledge besieged by countless challenges and sacrifices, leads him to the remote Isfahan, in Persia, where he meets Ibn Sina, the greatest healer of his time.
cast.title: The Physician

details.biography:
Olivier Martinez (born January 12, 1966) is a French film actor. He became known after roles in several French films, and has also appeared in Hollywood-produced features, including Unfaithful.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Olivier Martinez, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Olivier Martinez
